body:
Nice find! I was wondering why things were hanging.

For what it's worth, [it looks like a fix will be in OpenSSH 7.3](https://bugzilla.mindrot.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1988). Good to see a fix go-side though, considering it will take a while before >=7.3 is the norm.

[Link to patch](https://github.com/openssh/openssh-portable/commit/d2d6bf864e52af8491a60dd507f85b74361f5da3), was applied April 2016.
